name: kefir.partial.lenses
description: Partial Lenses functions lifted to work on Kefir properties

scripts.dist: concurrently "npm run dist:umd" "npm run dist:umd.min" "npm run dist:es" "npm run dist:cjs"
scripts.dist:cjs: NODE_ENV=           rollup -c -n kefir.partial.lenses -i src/kefir.partial.lenses.js -f cjs -o dist/kefir.partial.lenses.cjs.js
scripts.dist:es: NODE_ENV=           rollup -c -n kefir.partial.lenses -i src/kefir.partial.lenses.js -f es  -o dist/kefir.partial.lenses.es.js
scripts.dist:umd: NODE_ENV=dev        rollup -c -n kefir.partial.lenses -i src/kefir.partial.lenses.js -f umd -o dist/kefir.partial.lenses.js
scripts.dist:umd.min: NODE_ENV=production rollup -c -n kefir.partial.lenses -i src/kefir.partial.lenses.js -f umd -o dist/kefir.partial.lenses.min.js
scripts.prepare: npm run lint && npm run dist && npm run test
